Title: Calculate Your Leaving Time
Teaser: Quickly find out what time you need to leave the office based on your arrival time.
Prompt Hint: Enter your arrival time in 24-hour format to calculate when you can leave after a full workday.

Input your arrival time in 24-hour format.
Add 8 hours and 40 minutes to determine your leaving time.
